DOC.brief_summary: In this study the investigators compare the usual way of embryo transfer (without medication) with an embryo transfer while administering oxytocine antagonist. This to improve implantation and increase the pregnancy rate.
DOC.brief_title: Oxytocin Antagonist in Patients With Repeated Failure of Implantation
DOC.criteria: IVF/ ICSI patients below 38 years 2e to 6e IVFcycle patients with endocrinological diseases or problems
